definition: extremely robust, home appliance consisting of a flat metal base that is heated and used to smooth cloth, press and smooth with a heated iron
details:
adjective
- extremely robust
= example: extremely robust
= synonyms: cast-iron
noun
- home appliance consisting of a flat metal base that is heated and used to smooth cloth
= synonyms: smoothing iron
- a golf club that has a relatively narrow metal head
- implement used to brand live stock
= synonyms: branding iron
- a heavy ductile magnetic metallic element
verb
- press and smooth with a heated iron
= synonyms: press
